summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the GeoTIFF raster source implementation, checking correct handling of different data types, raw chip extraction (including protobuf formats), window loading, configuration URI validation, spatial offset adjustments, channel ordering, and integration with raster statistics transformers.
business_intent: To guarantee reliable ingestion and preprocessing of GeoTIFF raster data within the geospatial AI platform, ensuring that the raster source behaves correctly across various scenarios and integrates smoothly with downstream analytics.
